author: Phil Ward
description: The Last Word is classically made with gin, maraschino, Chartreuse and lime juice. In this riff, whiskey replaces the gin, and Mr Ward switches citrus fruits from lime to lemon.
name: Final Ward
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
